bwwExcerpt: Sure, ignorance may indeed be bliss, the truth doesn’t always set you free, and, yes, love may be blind. But ending “Oedipus” on an upbeat flashback is the greatest tragedy of this otherwise impressive update.

keyPhrases.quote: ending "Oedipus" on an upbeat flashback is the greatest tragedy
the greatest tragedy of this otherwise impressive update

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Despite strong criticism of the ending choice, the critic calls it an 'otherwise impressive update,' indicating the production succeeds in most areas with one significant flaw. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses a mixed sentiment, highlighting an impressive update but criticizing the ending, leading to a conditional recommendation. | Note: Models differed by 13 points.
